snippet.title: Outbound - Official Gameplay Trailer | ID@Xbox
snippet.description:
Hop into your camper van and embark on a relaxing nature trip in this new Outbound trailer for the upcoming open-world exploration game. In Outbound, build your own home on wheels and live sustainably off-grid. The new Outbound trailer shows peaceful nature settings, collecting resources, decorating your camper living space, building elements, vehicle customization, and more! 

Outbound will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
